name: github_update_issue
description: Update an existing GitHub issue. Can update the title, description, state (open/closed), priority, and labels. Use this tool to modify issue details, close issues, or update their status.

issue_number.description: The issue number to update. This is required to identify which issue to modify.

title.description: New title for the issue. If not provided, the title remains unchanged.

description.description: New description/body for the issue. Supports markdown formatting. If not provided, the description remains unchanged.

state.description: Change the issue state to 'open' or 'closed'.

priority.description: Update priority level: 'high', 'medium', or 'low'. This will update/add the priority label.

labels.description: New set of labels to apply to the issue. This replaces all existing labels (except priority if specified separately). Example: ['bug', 'documentation']

url.description: The URL of the updated issue

title.description: The current title of the issue

state.description: The current state of the issue (open/closed)
